meanings.definition: Failing to notice or pay attention to things.
meanings.sent1: The unobservant student missed the important announcement.
meanings.sent2: She is often unobservant and forgets where she puts her keys.
meanings.sent3: The unobservant detective overlooked the crucial clue right in front of him.
meanings.sent4: His unobservant nature led him to miss the beauty of the changing seasons.
meanings.sent5: Being unobservant can sometimes result in missing out on wonderful surprises.

meanings.definition: Not observant; not watchful or attentive.
meanings.sent1: The unobservant guard failed to notice the intruder sneaking in.
meanings.sent2: He is so unobservant that he often bumps into things while walking.
meanings.sent3: The unobservant driver missed the turn because he was daydreaming.
meanings.sent4: Her unobservant behavior made her an easy target for pickpockets.
meanings.sent5: It's dangerous to be unobservant when crossing busy streets.
